projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A modern e-commerce platform with React and Node.js
projects.fullDescription: Built a full-stack e-commerce platform featuring real-time inventory management, payment integration with Stripe, and responsive design. Implemented advanced search and filtering capabilities with Elasticsearch.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: Collaborative task management with real-time updates
projects.fullDescription: A real-time collaborative task management application built with React, Firebase, and WebSockets. Features drag-and-drop functionality, team collaboration, and automated notifications.

projects.title: IoT Smart Home Hubb
projects.description: Smart home automation and device management system
projects.fullDescription: A centralized hub for controlling smart home devices with automation rules, voice control integration, and energy monitoring.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time weather tracking with beautiful UI
projects.fullDescription: A weather application with real-time data from OpenWeather API, featuring location-based forecasts, hourly updates, and an elegant dark theme interface.

projects.title: Music Streaming App
projects.fullDescription: A music streaming application with playlist management, search functionality, and audio player controls. Designed with a dark theme similar to Spotify.

projects.title: Social Media Dashboard
projects.fullDescription: An analytics dashboard for tracking social media metrics across multiple platforms with real-time data visualization and performance insights.

projects.title: Video Conferencing Platform
projects.description: Real-time video communication with screen sharing
projects.fullDescription: A WebRTC-based video conferencing platform with screen sharing, chat, and recording capabilities. Supports multiple participants with HD quality.

projects.title: Project Management Tool
projects.description: Agile project management with Kanban boards
projects.fullDescription: An agile project management solution featuring Kanban boards, sprint planning, time tracking, and team collaboration tools.

projects.title: Real Estate Platform
projects.fullDescription: A full-featured real estate platform with property listings, virtual tours, agent management, and lead tracking capabilities.

projects.title: Food Delivery App
projects.description: On-demand food delivery platform with real-time tracking
projects.fullDescription: A complete food delivery application with restaurant management, real-time order tracking, payment integration, and delivery optimization.

projects.title: Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Business intelligence and data visualization tool
projects.fullDescription: An advanced analytics dashboard with custom reports, real-time data updates, drill-down capabilities, and predictive analytics.
